Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.common.io

Class OutboundHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.common.io.OutboundHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
PrintableOutboundHandler
public class OutboundHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
An OutboundHandler takes messages in a thread-safe way and prints them to the OutputStream using a single thread
